document_data.name: Anti-Plant Shell
document_data.mainbody: '''''Anti-plant shell''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[abjuration]] [[spell]] from the [[plant sphere|plant]] and [[protection sphere]]s that created a barrier that was impassable to all forms of plant life.
document_data.Effects: This spell created a protective invisible barrier measuring {{SI|15|ft|long=yes}} in all directions. The barrier prevented all plant life, including [[treant]]s and [[shambling mound]]s, from crossing for the duration of the spell.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History:
The ''[[Scepter of Mystra]]'', a relic of the [[Mystra]]n faith, could create ''anti-plant shells''.{{cite book/Prayers from the Faithful|77-80}}

It was recorded in ''[[Yornar's Trail Companion]]'', a holy text of the [[church of Mielikki]].<ref>
